00001 <?php
00002 /* vim: set expandtab sw=4 ts=4 sts=4: */
00012 class PageLink
00013         {
00014                 private $url   = "./";
00015                 private $pp    = 10;
00016                 private $ml    = 7;
00017                 private $_data = array();
00018                 private $cnt;
00019                 private $html;
00020                 private $pageid;
00021                 private $total_pages;
00022                 private $query_limit;
00023                 private $query_first;
00024                 private $query_last;
00025                 
00034                 public function __construct($entrycount, $perpage = 10, $maxlinks = 7)
00035                 {
00036                         // init values
00037                         $this->html = "";
00038                         $this->pp   = $perpage;
00039                         $this->ml   = $maxlinks;
00040                         $this->cnt  = $entrycount;
00041                         
00042                         // prepare generation of html
00043                         $this->prepare();
00044                 }
00045                 
00051                 private function prepare()
00052                 {
00053                         if (isset($_GET["pageid"]))
00054                                 {
00055                                         $this->pageid = intval($_GET["pageid"]);
00056                                 }
00057                         else
00058                                 {
00059                                         $this->pageid = 0;
00060                                 }
00061                                 
00062                         $this->total_pages = ceil($this->cnt / $this->pp);
00063                         $this->query_limit = "LIMIT ".($this->pp * $this->pageid).",".$this->pp;
00064                         $this->query_first = ($this->pp * $this->pageid + 1);
00065                         $this->query_last  = ($this->pp * ($this->pageid + 1));
00066                         
00067                         // force valid values
00068                         if ($this->pageid + 1 > $this->total_pages)
00069                                 {
00070                                         $this->pageid = $this->total_pages - 1;
00071                                 }
00072                         else if ($this->pageid < 0)
00073                                 {
00074                                         $this->pageid = 0;
00075                                 }
00076                                 
00077                         // save other query values in url
00078                         if (isset($_SERVER["QUERY_STRING"]) && ! empty($_SERVER["QUERY_STRING"]))
00079                                 {
00080                                         $this->url = "./?".preg_replace("@pageid=(\d+)|&pageid=(\d+)@i", "", $_SERVER["QUERY_STRING"]);
00081                                 }
00082                         else
00083                                 {
00084                                         $this->url = "./?page=home";
00085                                 }
00086                 }
00087                 
00093                 private function generate()
00094                 {
00095                         $this->html = "Seite";
00096                         // less than 10 links -> one row, no splitting
00097                         if ($this->total_pages <= $this->ml)
00098                                 {
00099                                         $this->get_links_from(1, $this->total_pages);
00100                                 }
00101                         elseif($this->pageid > 3 && $this->pageid <= ($this->total_pages - 5))
00102                         {
00103                                 $this->get_links_from(1, 2);
00104                                 $this->html .= "&nbsp;...";
00105                                 $this->get_links_from($this->pageid, $this->pageid + 2);
00106                                 $this->html .= "&nbsp;...";
00107                                 $this->get_links_from($this->total_pages - 1, $this->total_pages);
00108                         }
00109                         elseif($this->pageid <= 3)
00110                         {
00111                                 $last = $this->pageid + 2;
00112                                 if ($last < 5)
00113                                         {
00114                                                 $last = 5;
00115                                         }
00116                                 $this->get_links_from(1, $last);
00117                                 $this->html .= "&nbsp;...";
00118                                 $this->get_links_from($this->total_pages - 1, $this->total_pages);
00119                         }
00120                         elseif($this->pageid >= ($this->total_pages - 4))
00121                         {
00122                                 $this->get_links_from(1, 2);
00123                                 $this->html .= "&nbsp;...";
00124                                 $this->get_links_from($this->total_pages - 4, $this->total_pages);
00125                         }
00126                 }
00127                 
00135                 private function get_links_from($start, $end)
00136                 {
00137                         for ($i = $start; $i <= $end; $i++)
00138                                 {
00139                                         if (($this->pageid + 1) == $i)
00140                                                 {
00141                                                         $this->html .= "&nbsp;(&nbsp;$i&nbsp;)";
00142                                                 }
00143                                         else
00144                                                 {
00145                                                         $this->html .= "&nbsp;".$this->get_page_link($i);
00146                                                 }
00147                                 }
00148                 }
00149                 
00155                 public function get_query_limit()
00156                 {
00157                         return $this->query_limit;
00158                 }
00159                 
00166                 public function get_page_link($page)
00167                 {
00168                         return "<a title=\"Seite $page\" href=\"$this->url&amp;pageid=".($page-1)."\">$page</a>";
00169                 }
00170                 
00176                 public function __toString()
00177                 {
00178                         $this->generate();
00179                         return $this->html;
00180                 }
00181                 
00182         }
